techmeme.title: Blackstone invests $300M in DDN, which helps organizations store and analyze large amounts of data more efficiently for AI and HPC, at a $5B valuation (Wall Street Journal)

A look at AI-enabled wearables like Bee AI and Omi, with embedded always-on microphones to record conversations around users and provide actionable insights (Julian Chokkattu/Wired)
Analysts say that contract negotiations between US dockworkers and the shipping industry over automation could help provide a template for agreements nationwide (Taylor Nicole Rogers/Financial Times)
US dockworkers and shipping industry officials reach a tentative labor agreement, overcoming differences over the introduction of automated machinery at ports (Peter Eavis/New York Times)
